Indwelling, Consider for genital burns and all patients undergoing fluid resuscitation
Consider patient's age and weight in choosing an appropriate goal urine output
q1h for 24 hour, special instructions: Urine output goal 0.5 to 1 mL/kg/hr for weight greater than or equal to 30 kg
q1h for 24 hour, special instructions: Urine output goal 1 to 2 mL/kg/hr for weight up to 30 kg
q6h, Notify physician if rising or greater than 12 millimetres mercury (consider if increasing ventilatory pressures, decreasing urine output or increasing abdominal distension)
q6h, Notify physician if rising or greater than 12 mmHg (consider if increasing ventilatory pressures, decreasing urine output or increasing abdominal distension)
